Html:
Operating System: Windows XP Professional (5.1, Build 2600) Service Pack 3

Processor: AMD Athlon(tm) 64 Processor 3000+,  MMX,  3DNow, ~1.8GHz
Memory: 2048MB RAM
Page File: 950MB used, 2479MB available

I used Rawr 2 throught all Wrath with several classes and specs and loved it.

I tryed the browser and offline version of Rawr 4 and I found it very slow (30-40 sec to filter in/out a tier or a iLvl range, 10 sec to equip an item, 6-8 sec to add or remove a talent poin) on both version. I tryed Druid Cat and Bear, Shaman Resto and Enha, Priest Shadow and Warrior Arms.

I have an old pc, I know.

Is there any setting to work with in both Rawr4 or Silverlight to improve performance?

Thanks
The only thing that I can think of is reduce the number of programs running in the background.
